description: This file defines a workflow for fetching top Hacker News stories, processing them with agents, and generating a report. It includes class definitions, method implementations, and external library usage related to Redis storage, HTTP requests, and data processing.

classes.name: HackerNewsReporter
classes.description: A workflow class that fetches top Hacker News stories, processes them with agents, and generates a report.

methods.name: get_top_hackernews_stories
methods.description: Fetches top stories from Hacker News API and returns them as a JSON string.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the workflow: retrieves top stories, processes them, and yields report responses.
